section.title: Sorting Virtual Machines and Templates
section.para: Virtual machines and templates can be sorted by Name, Cluster, Host, Datastore, Compliance, Last Analysis Time, Total Snapshots, or Region.

procedure.title: To Sort Virtual Machines or Templates

step.para: Click the accordion for the items to sort.
To sort virtual machines or templates when in grid or tile view:
From the Sort by dropdown, click the attribute to sort.
To sort virtual machines or templates when in list view:
Click on the Column Name to sort. For example, click on Cluster to sort by the name of the cluster.
